title: (x) Mary Bryant TV show titles - Bembo {Mike Y}
content:
Does anyone recognise this font taken from the Mary Bryant TV show titles?

It’s really bugging me because I know it’s a simple font with a few alternate versions of certain letters - I’m sure I’ve seen it around somewhere.

Any help would be most appreciated.  
Cheers!

Terry

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [marybryant.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121040002/http:/typophile.com/files/marybryant.jpg) | 77.65 KB |

 [‹ (x) Johnny Walker label serif face - Adobe Serif substitution font {Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121040002/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16017 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Glass Love movie logo - Busorama {Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121040002/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16014 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tscruby

comments.content:
It looks to me like a customized version of Bembo Bold. See the bowing of the K? The swashes are not identical, if you look at the R’s.

- Mike Yanega

Cheers for that Mike, nice one. Bembo looks like it’ll do the job for me. Thanks,

Terry
